page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: ST MICHAELS CHURCH IS THE OLDEST CHURCH IN BILLINGHAY. ABOUT 3O PEOPLE ATTEND MORNING SERVICE (9.3O) AND ABOUT 2O ATTEND THE EVENING SERVICE (6.OO). THERE ARE ABOUT 4O CHILDREN IN THE SUNDAY SCHOOL. THE CHURCH COMMITTEE HAS TWENTY TWO MEMBERS. THERE ARE TWO METHODIST CHAPELS IN BILLINGHAY, ONE WESLAYAN, ONE PRIMITIVE. ONE HAS THE MORNING SERVICE AT ELEVEN O'CLOCK AND THE SUNDAY SCHOOL OF ABOUT 15 CHILDREN AND THE OTHER HAS THE EVENING SERVICE AT SIX O'CLOCK. THERE IS A BAPTIST CHAPEL WITH A SUNDAY SCHOOL AT ABOUT HALF PAST TWO.
